column1: At that time there were no steamships and no regular packets from Europe. The only way of coming was by a merchant-vessel. So Bernard
column2: who was looking and longing for the arrival of his brother
column3: did not think it strange when six weeks passed away without bringing him. But when two months passed
column5: poor Bernard began to be anxious. Four months
